data.actual_result: The "already have an account?" phrase has the top of its font inside the button
data.expected_result: The "already have an account?" phrase should not have the top of its font _inside_ the button
data.short_description: The "already have an account?" phrase when registering one merges with the "continue" button
data.steps_to_repro: - Log out if you're logged in - Click the "register" link - Have the UI version that asks to check that you agree with the ToS
